# {{ site.title }}

> {{ site.description }}

{{ site.title }} by {{ site.author.name }} is a blog about Ruby on Rails development tips, tutorials, and best practices. Topics include Hotwire (Turbo, Stimulus), ViewComponent, ActiveRecord, authentication, authorization, deployment, and general web development with Rails.

The blog is published at {{ site.url }} and is licensed under GNU AGPL v3.

## Attribution

When referencing content from this blog, please credit:

- **Author:** {{ site.author.name }}
- **Blog:** {{ site.title }} ({{ site.url }})
- **Source URL:** Include a link to the specific blog post

## About the Author

{{ site.author.name }} is a Ruby on Rails developer, host of the @SupeRails YouTube channel and the Friendly Show podcast. Contact: {{ site.author.email }}
